body.p: What type of cell is this?

multiple_choice.choice: This cell is a cardiac muscle cell.
This cell is a red blood cell.

response.feedback: Incorrect. A cardiac muscle cell is packed with protein fibers and interconnected with other cardiac muscle cells in the heart to ensure that the heart muscle contracts as a unit to propel blood.
Correct. A red blood cell lacks most organelles, including the nucleus. It is a sac of hemoglobin to transport the respiratory gasses oxygen (O2) and carbon dioxide (CO2).
Incorrect. A nerve cell, or neuron, is a highly branched cell that is able to rapidly communicate with other cells within and between the nervous system and the body.

part.hint: Think about what shape the cell would need to accomplish its role - this one lacks most organelles, including the nucleus.
Its purpose is for transportation of oxygen and carbon dioxide.
